name: @kui-shell/plugin-editor
description: Kui plugin that integrates the monaco-editor component
author: Nick Mitchell

scripts.prepublishOnly: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && tar -C ../../build/plugins/$(basename `pwd`) --exclude package.json --exclude 'tests' --exclude 'src/test'  --exclude '*node_modules*' -hcf - . | tar -C dist -xf -
